body.initial_step: This tour will guide you through the main functions of the app to get you started quickly.
body.net_worth_step: In this view you can track all your gains and losses and how much your stash is worth
body.bulk_sell_step: In this view you can share your stash items via a generated image and message to various Discord communities
body.settings_step: In this view you can manage your settings
body.profile_step: In this area you can manage your profiles, and create multiple ones for different setups for quick access.
body.snapshot_step: Here you take snapshots to record your current net worth, and you can also enable automatic snapshotting in the settings.
body.overlay_step: Here you can toggle the net worth overlay, for a slim overview while you map!
body.group_step: Here you can group up with your friends to see your combined net worth status.
body.notifications_step: Everything that happens in the app will be displayed here.
body.support_panel_step: Here you can see what's new in the latest release, report a bug, submit a feature request, re-run this tour or get our Discord server invitation.
body.currency_switch: Clicking this button will switch the currency type between chaos and exalts.
body.reset_income: Clicking this button resets your income.

body2.profile_step: Profiles are the core of the app where you select your stash tabs to track.
body2.snapshot_step: A snapshot represents a recording of your current stash tabs (controlled by the profile).
